key: A lively place for trading & selling your goods! Also serves as a nice base.
source_text: A lively place for trading & selling your goods! Also serves as a nice base.
target_text: 商品を売買できる活気のある場所！素敵な基地としても機能します。

key: A nice and cozy barn.. I wonder what its purpose is?
source_text: A nice and cozy barn.. I wonder what its purpose is?
target_text: 素敵で居心地の良い納屋...その目的は何なのだろう？
廃教会

key: All of Mo' Structures in one place!
source_text: All of Mo' Structures in one place!
target_text: すべてのMo' ストラクチャーsが一つの場所に！
納屋の家
戦塔...あ、灯台だ！

key: Eat and rest, traveler! We got you covered.
source_text: Eat and rest, traveler! We got you covered.
target_text: 食べて休みなさい、旅人よ！私たちがあなたを守ります。
てっぺんまで行け！

key: I wonder where its captain went?
source_text: I wonder where its captain went?
target_text: その船長はどこに行ったのだろう？
氷の塔

key: If you find an Iron Golem, salute him. He fought in the Forgotten War...
source_text: If you find an Iron Golem, salute him. He fought in the Forgotten War...
target_text: アイアンゴーレムを見かけたら敬礼しなさい。彼は忘れられた戦争で戦ったのだから...
ジャングルピラミッド
中に何か見つかるかも？
ミッション：ウサギを倒してお宝をゲット！

key: Perhaps the underground dungeon has loot?...
source_text: Perhaps the underground dungeon has loot?...
target_text: 地下のダンジョンにお宝があるのかな？...
略奪者の工場

key: Pillagers must have destroyed this monastery.
source_text: Pillagers must have destroyed this monastery.
target_text: 略奪者がこの修道院を破壊したに違いない。
海賊船
これほど...多く...の略奪者...
居酒屋
天空城
カエルバノスの殺し屋ウサギ
傲慢者の墓

key: This place seems to attract lots of strays...
source_text: This place seems to attract lots of strays...
target_text: この場所は野良猫をたくさん引きつけるようだ...
村人市場
村人の塔

key: Watch out for the priests on the lower level!
source_text: Watch out for the priests on the lower level!
target_text: 下層の司祭に気をつけろ！
